oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Workshop on the Supreme Court Decision on Segregation in the Public Schools
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Highlander brochure advertising their workshops on segregation in summer of 1954. Workshop topics include history of segregation, recent progress, state attitudes toward the Supreme Court decision, and planning follow-up programs. The pamphlet outlines a daily schedule and includes a basic overview of Highlander and future activities. This particular brochure was sent to Merl Eppse.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Segregation in education; School integration; Faculty integration; Civil rights; Public schools; Civil rights--United States--Cases; Segregation--Law and legislation
